title: GWM broadens Haval H6 mid-size SUV with two new variants
content:
GWM IS CONTINUING TO BROADEN customer choice in the mid-size SUV segment with the addition of two new electrified variants to its popular Haval H6 range, both with driveaway pricing.

Two new variants will be added to the line-up:

Haval H6 Lux 2WD Plug-in Hybrid (PHEV) – from $44,990 driveaway

Haval H6 Ultra AWD Hybrid (HEV) – from $47,490 driveaway

Designed to further strengthen the brand’s position in the competitive SUV segment, the introduction of the Haval H6 Lux 2WD Plug-in Hybrid (PHEV) introduces a new attractive entry point for customers wanting to invest in plug-in technology. Meanwhile, the Haval H6 Ultra AWD Hybrid — powered by GWM’s innovative Hi4 technology — introduces all-wheel drive capability to the traditional hybrid powertrain.

Originally launched in the H6 Ultra PHEV grade, GWM’s pioneering Hi4 (Hybrid Intelligent 4WD) technology offers customers a seamless blend of petrol and electric power across both axles. The result is instant torque, optimal efficiency, and enhanced all-terrain capability. By intelligently switching between multiple driving modes, Hi4 delivers maximum performance when required and maximum efficiency when it matters most. For Australian drivers, that translates to the confidence of all-wheel-drive traction, the refinement of electrified motoring, and exceptional everyday performance.

“The addition of these new variants further demonstrates GWM’s commitment to electrification and customer choice, providing even more reasons for Australians to consider the GWM brand,” said Steve Maciver, Head of Marketing and Communications at GWM. “With hybrid and plug-in hybrid technologies now available across both 2WD and AWD configurations, the Haval H6 stands as one of the most comprehensive electrified SUV ranges in the country.”

The new Haval H6 is backed by the comprehensive GWM Care program, which includes a seven-year/unlimited- kilometre new car warranty, eight-year/unlimited-kilometre battery pack warranty, five-year roadside assistance with 24/7 support, and five-year Capped Price Servicing — all backed by GWM’s extensive network of 117 dealerships nationwide.

The expanded Haval H6 range will be available in GWM showrooms across Australia from mid-September 2025.

2025 GWM Haval H6 Pricing

Lux       

2.0L Turbocharged Petrol                       2WD     $35,990

1.5L Turbocharged Petrol Hybrid       2WD     $40,990

1.5L Turbocharged Petrol PHEV         2WD     $44,990

Ultra

2.0L Turbocharged Petrol                       2WD     $38,990

1.5L Turbocharged Petrol Hybrid       2WD     $43,990

1.5L Turbocharged Petrol Hybrid      AWD     $47,490

1.5L Turbocharged Petrol PHEV         2WD     $47,990

1.5L Turbocharged Petrol PHEV         AWD     $50,990

*Driveaway pricing for private buyers only
